userStories.title: Create Stripe Products for DCA Insights (Pro $297/yr, Premium $597/yr)
acceptanceCriteria: Stripe products created for Pro tier ($297/year)
Stripe products created for Premium tier ($597/year)
userStories.notes: Products created: prod_TkWD66mcwJ2Cn3 (Pro), prod_TkWEGooet1Sab0 (Premium). Prices: price_1Sn1BWF1oOQhJ3pzmrGJ0F05 ($297/yr), price_1Sn1BlF1oOQhJ3pz9j3iOl22 ($597/yr). Current MRR: $0. Target: $1M/month. Need ~3,400 subscribers at $297/mo or ~10,000 at $99/mo

userStories.title: Wire Stripe Products to Pricing Page
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing page shows DCA Insights products
Webhooks update user tier on payment
userStories.notes: Pricing page already uses SUBSCRIPTION_PLANS with correct price IDs. Checkout flow wired to Stripe.

userStories.title: Add User Tier Enforcement to Protected Features
userStories.notes: Tier enforcement already implemented in calculator (isPro) and education page (userTier).

userStories.title: Implement Conversion Tracking Dashboard
userStories.notes: Analytics dashboard created at /admin/analytics. Shows MRR, conversion funnel, and path to $1M MRR.

userStories.title: Link Validation and E2E Test Suite
userStories.notes: Quality assurance: ensure all links work, add automated E2E tests for critical user paths.

userStories.title: Add Retirement DCA Blog Post + High-Value SEO Content
userStories.notes: SEO content targeting high-intent retirement/401k keywords to drive organic traffic.

userStories.title: Add Best S&P 500 Index Funds Blog Post for DCA
acceptanceCriteria: Targets 'best S&P 500 index fund', 'VOO vs SPY vs IVV', 'low cost index funds' keywords
Comparison table of top funds with expense ratios
userStories.notes: High-intent keyword targeting people ready to start investing. Drives traffic to calculator.

userStories.title: Add How Much to Invest Monthly Blog Post
acceptanceCriteria: Targets: how much to invest monthly, DCA amount calculator, investment amount guide
userStories.notes: High-intent keyword for people ready to start investing but unsure of amounts.

userStories.title: Add DCA for Beginners Complete Guide
acceptanceCriteria: Targets: how to start dollar cost averaging, DCA for beginners, investment automation
Internal links to all calculator tools
userStories.notes: Entry-level content to capture beginners searching for how to start.

userStories.title: Add Compound Interest with DCA Calculator Blog Post
acceptanceCriteria: Targets: compound interest calculator, DCA compound growth, investment growth calculator
userStories.notes: Compound interest is high-search-volume term, connect to DCA strategy.
